question: Sunil Sethi, the Chairman of Fashion Design Council of India, has been appointed as the advisor of which body?
explanation:
The Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC), which functions under MSME Ministry, has appointed Sunil Sethi as its advisor.
He is the Chairman of the Fashion Design Council of India (FDCI) and will advise the Commission on latest design interventions in the readymade garments segment. He would also focus on promotion of Khadi in India and abroad.
